marketing web projects

first.0: We support startups in Fintech, E-commerce, Health and another niches:

second.0: Rapid MVP Development: Transform your Startup idea into a functional MVP quickly with our streamlined development process, ensuring you hit the market faster.
second.1: Expertise: You will get a Team with a Middle to Senior knowladge of Python and Framework, Java and Node.js.
second.2: Cutting-Edge Solutions: Leverage the latest in fintech technologies, including blockchain, AI, and advanced analytics, to create innovative and secure MVPs.
second.3: Expert Team: Our skilled developers and industry experts work closely with you to bring your fintech vision to life, providing guidance and expertise at every stage.
second.4: Scalable Architecture: Build a robust MVP that can easily scale as your user base grows, ensuring long-term success and flexibility.
second.5: Compliance and Security: Ensure your MVP adheres to all regulatory standards and employs top-notch security measures to protect sensitive financial data.

third.0: Contact Us to schedule a consultation and unlock the full potential of custom software for your business!

first.0: Is your website failing to engage visitors?

second.0: Complete Development: From initial design concepts to full deployment, we offer a seamless, end-to-end process tailored to your needs.
second.1: Boost Engagement: Increase user interaction by 60% with immersive, interactive elements that keep visitors on your site longer.
second.2: Advanced Technologies: Utilizing the latest in web development tools, including React, Node.JS and JavaScript frameworks, we create dynamic and responsive websites.
second.3: Creative Experts: Our team of experienced designers and developers bring innovative ideas to life, ensuring your site stands out from the competition.

third.0: Contact Us and transform your online presence!

first.0: Let’s automate tasks and save your money!

second.0: Personalized Solutions: From chatbots and virtual assistants to automation tools, we design and develop custom AI solutions tailored to your specific needs and objectives.
second.1: Boost Efficiency: Say goodbye to time-consuming tasks and human errors. AI and ML Development will automate processes, saving you up to 60% in operational costs while ensuring accuracy and consistency.
second.2: Stay Ahead of the Curve: With access to cutting-edge technologies like natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning algorithms, provides continuously learn and evolve to deliver smarter, more intuitive interactions.
second.3: Expert Guidance: Our team of AI and ML specialists and developers work closely with you to understand your business goals and challenges, providing strategic insights and ongoing support to maximize the impact of your AI initiatives.

third.0: Contact Us to schedule a consultation and discover the power of custom AI for your business!

first.0: Not If but When and How! Let Us Protect Your Business!

second.0: Comprehensive Security Solutions: From initial risk assessment to full implementation, we provide a seamless, end-to-end cybersecurity strategy tailored to the unique needs of fintech startups.
second.1: Enhance Protection: Strengthen your security posture by 70% with advanced threat detection and prevention measures, safeguarding your MVP from cyber threats.
second.2: Cutting-Edge Technologies: Leveraging the latest in cybersecurity tools, including AI-driven threat intelligence, encryption, and multi-factor authentication, we ensure robust protection for your fintech MVP.
second.3: Expert Team: Our seasoned cybersecurity professionals bring extensive industry knowledge, ensuring your MVP is secure and compliant with the highest standards, giving you a competitive edge.

third.0: Contact Us Today to schedule a consultation and secure your digital future!

first.0: Amplify Your Brand with Digital Marketing Excellence

second.0: Comprehensive Approach: From SEO to social media, we handle everything, providing a seamless experience.
second.1: Increase Visibility by 70%: Our targeted campaigns ensure your brand reaches the right audience, increasing your online presence significantly.

second.4: Don't Get Left Behind: The digital landscape is evolving fast. Stay ahead of your competitors with our innovative solutions.

description.first: Our E-Commerce client get up to 50% Higher Conversion Rate.
description.second: Also we help to achieve 30% Faster Load Times and up to 40% Drop in Bounce Rates.

description_next.first: Sales Boosted up to 50% with a Conversion-Focused Website.

tags.8: Technology and SaaS (Software as a Service)

content.first: Businesses need a highly convertible website to:

second.1: Increase conversion rates and generate more leads.
second.2: Reduce bounce rates by retaining visitors.
second.3: Optimize website performance across all devices.

second.0: Responsive Design: We developed a responsive design that looks and works perfectly on all devices.
second.1: Fast Load Times: We optimised the site's performance, achieving a load time of less than 2 seconds and reducing the bounce rate.
second.2: User-Centric Design: Created an intuitive and attractive design that improved the user experience and increased conversion rates by 18%.
second.3: SEO Optimization: Implemented SEO best practices to improve search engine rankings, increasing organic traffic by 23%.
second.4: Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Used data-driven strategies to improve conversion elements, resulting in a 20% increase in leads.
second.5: Content Management Systems (CMS): Provide easy-to-use CMS for seamless content updates, increasing website efficiency by 30%.
second.6: Analytics and A/B Testing: Utilize advanced analytics and A/B testing to optimise website performance, increasing ROI by 15%.

second.0: 50% Increase in Conversion Rates: More visitors became potential customers.
second.1: 30% Reduction in Bounce Rates: Visitors stay on the site longer and interact with it more.
second.2: 40% Faster Load Times: Improved user experience with less than 2 seconds load time. Compared to the previous site.
second.3: 23% More Organic Traffic: SEO drives organic traffic and reduces advertising costs.

first.0: Web Development Lead: Expert in creating high-performance, responsive websites.
first.1: UX/UI Designer: Specializes in user-centric designs that enhance engagement and conversion rates.
first.2: SEO Specialist: Ensures websites are optimized for search engines to drive organic traffic.

0.question: Q: Imagine you need to increase sales in 1-3 months.
0.answer: A: To do this, we will conduct in-depth analyses of your business model and marketing. Based on this information, we will find the critical points where we can increase sales and reduce losses.

1.question: Q: Can you guarantee fast loading of my website?
1.answer: A: Yes, we optimise site performance to achieve sub-2 second load times, which significantly reduces bounce rates.

2.question: Q: What are the benefits of responsive design for my business?
2.answer: A: Responsive design ensures that your website looks and functions perfectly on all devices, reducing bounce rates and improving the user experience. Most of the traffic today is coming from mobile devices. Therefore, we pay maximum attention to this part.

3.question: Q: What kind of ROI can I expect from your services?
3.answer: A: Typically, clients see from 200% improvement in ROI due to improved website performance and increased conversion rates. This is a calculation from a one-year perspective.

second.title: Digital Marketing
second.technologies: SEO, PPC, Social Media, Analytics, AI, Video Marketing

description.first: If you face Weak brand awareness or Difficulty generating leads! You are in the Right Place to fix it.

description_next.first: Boosted lead generation by 53% and increased conversion by 38%:

second.0: Increased website traffic by 35% through SEO optimization

content.first: A clothing brand was looking for a solution to:

second.1: Drive high quality traffic to their website and social media.
second.3: Develop high-quality audience engagement through content marketing, social media, and email campaigns.

content.first: For this solution, we chose multichannel promotion and testing:

second.0: SEO Optimization: Improving search engine rankings to increase organic traffic.
second.1: PPC Campaigns: Attracting traffic through targeted pay-per-click advertising. Increase the number of clicks.
second.2: Content Marketing: Relevant content to attract and nurture leads, increasing audience engagement.
second.3: Social Media Management: Expand your social media presence with targeted strategies to increase followers and engagement.
second.4: Email Marketing: Develop an effective email campaign to attract potential customers.
second.5: Advanced Analytics and Tracking: Implement tools to measure and optimise campaign performance, increasing your marketing ROI.
second.6: A/B Testing: Optimise ad copy, images, and calls to action.

content.first: Implementing our digital marketing services can lead to:

second.0: 40% Increase in Website Traffic: Drive more organic traffic with targeted strategies.
second.1: 30% Higher Conversion Rates: Optimise your lead generation and conversion processes.
second.2: 50% Improved Engagement: Engage your audience with engaging content and social media strategies.
second.3: 433% ROI: Total return on investment per project.

first.0: Digital Marketing Strategist: Expert in developing and implementing comprehensive B2B marketing plans.
first.1: Data Analyst: Specializes in analyzing campaign data to provide actionable insights.
first.2: Content Marketing Manager: Focuses on creating and managing engaging content for blogs, whitepapers, and social media.
first.3: SEO Specialist: Ensures websites are optimized for search engines to increase organic traffic.

0.question: Q: How do your services help increase website traffic?
0.answer: A: By tailoring your digital marketing strategy to your specific audience, using effective keywords, and optimising your content, we help drive more quality visitors to your website.

1.question: Q: Can I track the performance of my campaigns in real time?
1.answer: A: Yes, we provide advanced analytics and tracking tools so that you can monitor the performance of your campaigns and make necessary adjustments to achieve better results.

2.question: Q: How does content marketing work for B2B companies?
2.answer: A:We create relevant and engaging content tailored to your target audience, helping you attract and nurture leads through blogs, whitepapers, case studies and more.

3.question: Q: What level of ROI can I expect from your services?
3.answer: A: Clients typically experience ROI of 200% or more.

third.title: Configurator
third.technologies: React, Node, HTML, CSS, JS, Firebase

description.first: Virtual Configurator for Modular Homes - a proven solution for Customised products!

description_next.first: Virtual Cofigurator: Customers are able to create customised home designs, save and share links.

second.1: Reduced bounce rate by 30%: Achieved this figure by increasing customer attachment to the design they created.
second.2: Increased Engagement: Additional options and the ability to share the link to the design increased the number of visits and closed deals.
second.3: Increased customer satisfaction by 43%: Information taken from previous and current surveys.

content.first: A manufacturer of modular houses had a request for:

second.0: Increase sales in a period of instability.
second.1: Increase the network in Ukraine and expand to the Czech Republic.
second.3: To find an opportunity to stand out in the market and show their advantages.

content.first: Development of the Modular Home Configurator that allows customers to customise products in real time, improving their shopping experience and increasing the likelihood of purchase. Key features include:

second.0: Save and Share: Customers can save their designs and share them with others.
second.1: 100% Mobile Ready: Adapted for mobile devices. About 80% of traffic comes from mobile devices
second.2: 1.5 Seconds Load Time: Fast loading time provides a better user experience.

content.first: For our Client we achieved the following results when we added the Configurator to our website:

second.0: 26% more sales: Customised options - more customers click the ‘buy’ button. Compared to the previous period for 2 months.
second.1: Better user experience: Interactivity and engagement that keeps customers interested.
second.2: 20% fewer bounces: When customers see the product first, they are more satisfied with the outcome.

first.0: Project Manager: Oversee the entire development process, ensuring timelines are met and provide daily updates.
first.1: Software Developer: Front-End together with Back-End developer.
first.2: UI/UX Designer: Ensure the configurator is intuitive and visually appealing, enhancing the overall user experience.
first.3: QA Specialist: Rigorously test the configurator to identify and fix any bugs or issues before launch.
first.4: Customer Support: Provide ongoing assistance to clients, helping them get the most out of their configurator.

0.question: Q: How can the configurator increase my sales?
0.answer: A: Configurator increases sales by providing a highly engaging and interactive shopping experience. Customers can visualise and customise their products in real time, which increases their satisfaction and confidence in making a purchase decision. This leads to a 30% increase in sales as more customers complete their purchases.

1.question: Q: Will the configurator work on mobile devices?
1.answer: A: Yes, our Configurator is 100% mobile ready. It is designed to work seamlessly on any device, providing a smooth and enjoyable user experience, regardless of the device. A fast load time of 1.5 seconds further enhances the usability on mobile devices.

2.question: Q: How does the configurator help reduce the number of failures?
2.answer: A: By allowing customers to visualise and customise their products prior to purchase, the configurator helps set accurate expectations. This reduces the likelihood of failure by 20% as customers are more satisfied with their customised products and less likely to encounter surprises on delivery.

3.question: Q: What products can benefit from a configurator?
3.answer: A: Configurators are ideal for Modular Homes, Custom Furniture, Cars, Jewellery, Kitchens, Fashion, Shoes, Travel Packages. Essentially, any product that can be tailored to individual preferences can benefit from the Configurator.

4.question: Q: How will the configurator be integrated with my existing website?
4.answer: A: We can easily develop a Configurator, whether it is a custom website technology or a website building platform. We provide comprehensive support throughout the entire integration process, ensuring that the Configurator functions perfectly within your site and enhances your current digital ecosystem.

fourth.title: Corporate Cybersecurity
fourth.technologies: Network Security, Endpoint Security, AI and Machine Learning

description.first: Reduced the risk of data leakage by 80% with the help of corporate Cybersecurity consulting services!

description_next.first: We developed a Strategy and Tactical Measures for a Ukrainian law firm. We also conducted cybersecurity training for the staff.

content.first: The company was looking for comprehensive cybersecurity solutions to:

second.0: Protect confidential data from leaks and cyberattacks.
second.1: Ensure compliance with industry regulations and standards.
second.2: Gain access to expert knowledge and resources.
second.3: Minimise operational disruption caused by security incidents.

content.first: Our team analysed the possible ways to implement the request and prepared a set of solutions:

second.0: Threat detection and response: We implemented advanced threat detection systems that detect and respond to threats in real time.
second.1: Data encryption: Protect sensitive data with strong encryption methods to protect it from unauthorised access and reduce the risk of data breaches.
second.2: Security audits: Conduct comprehensive security audits to identify vulnerabilities and implement corrective measures.
second.3: Incident response planning: Developed and implemented incident response plans to minimise downtime and losses during a security incident, reducing recovery time.
second.4: Employee training: Provided cybersecurity training to employees so they can recognise and prevent potential threats, reducing the likelihood of successful phishing attacks.

content.first: The implementation of these activities and software has yielded the following results for our Client:

second.0: Data leakage reduction: Effective security measures have significantly reduced the risk of data leakage.
second.1: Reduced risk of cyber-attacks: Proactive threat detection and response systems have reduced potential attacks.
second.2: Faster recovery from incidents: Effective incident response plans minimise potential downtime and loss.
second.3: Reduced phishing attacks: Employee training reduces the likelihood of successful phishing attacks.

first.0: Cyber Security Analyst: Expert in threat detection and incident response with over 10 years of experience.
first.1: Compliance Specialist: Specialises in regulatory compliance, ensuring that businesses meet industry standards.
first.2: Security Auditor: Conducts thorough security audits to identify and remediate vulnerabilities.
first.3: Training Coordinator: Focuses on developing and delivering effective cybersecurity awareness training programmes.

0.question: Q: How do your services help reduce the risk of data breaches?
0.answer: A: We implement advanced threat detection, data encryption, and continuous monitoring to protect sensitive data and detect threats in real-time.

1.question: Q: Can you help us stay compliant with industry regulations?
1.answer: A: Yes, our compliance management services ensure your business meets regulatory requirements, reducing the risk of fines and reputational damage.

2.question: Q: What is the benefit of having an incident response plan?
2.answer: A: An incident response plan helps minimize downtime and losses during a security incident, enabling faster recovery and reducing operational disruptions.

3.question: Q: How effective is employee training in preventing cyber attacks?
3.answer: A: Our training programs educate employees on recognizing and preventing potential threats, significantly reducing the likelihood of successful phishing attacks and other social engineering tactics.
